subject: feat(D3): add multi-repository aggregation script
body:
Implement aggregation to combine data from multiple repositories:
- scripts/aggregate.js: Combines repo data with author identity mapping
- config/author-map.example.json: Example author mapping configuration
- config/author-map.schema.json: JSON schema for validation

Also adds repo_id support:
- scripts/extract.js: Now includes repo_id in metadata and commits
- Enables tracking commit source in aggregated views

Documentation updates:
- ADMIN_GUIDE.md: Added aggregation section
- USER_GUIDE.md: Added multi-repository view section
- TODO.md: Marked D3 as complete
